description:
How do you protect sensitive data like API keys on the Jamstack? in this episode, Joyce Lin teaches us how to use Postman to rapidly prototype and develop secure Jamstack apps!

- demo: https://secure-jamstack-api-requests.netlify.app/
- repo: https://github.com/jlengstorf/secure-jamstack-api-requests

Links:
- https://docs.netlify.com/functions/build-with-javascript/?utm_source=learnwithjason&utm_medium=protect-secrets-jl&utm_campaign=devex
- https://www.postman.com/
- https://unsplash.com/documentation
- https://github.com/netlify/cli/blob/master/docs/netlify-dev.md
- https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/Fetch_API/Using_Fetch
- https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/HTTP/CORS
- https://www.twitch.tv/getpostman

Watch future episodes live at https://www.twitch.tv/jlengstorf
